item.title: CVE-2024-3297|2024-07-24T08:02:52.777Z -- connectivity%20standards%20alliance -- matter
item.description: An issue in the Certificate Authenticated Session Establishment (CASE) protocol for establishing secure sessions between two devices, as implemented in the Matter protocol versions before Matter 1.1 allows an attacker to replay manipulated CASE Sigma1 messages to make the device unresponsive untilÂ the device is power-cycled.
